channel.title: Engineering on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: New adhesive surface modeled on a remora works underwater
item.description: It was tested for its ability to adhere to the inside of the digestive tract.

item.title: Meta Is Going to Let Job Candidates Use AI During Coding Tests
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg has said vibecoding will be a major part of Meta’s engineering work in the near future.
